mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_role ( user_id, role_id, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{roleId}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_role SET user_id = #{userId}, role_id = #{roleId}, create_time = #{createTime}
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, role_id, create_time FROM user_role WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, user_id, role_id, create_time FROM user_role
